name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description:
Pasta is a staple food of traditional Italian cuisine, with the first reference dating to 1154 in Sicily.

Also commonly used to refer to the variety of pasta dishes, pasta is typically a noodle made from an unleavened dough of a durum wheat flour mixed with water or eggs and formed into sheets or various shapes, then cooked by boiling or baking. As an alternative for those wanting a different taste, or who need to avoid products containing gluten, some pastas can be made using rice flour in place of wheat.[3][4] Pastas may be divided into two broad categories, dried (pasta secca) and fresh (pasta fresca).

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Traditional Italian pizza topped with tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and basil.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake with a layer of creamy chocolate frosting.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet with a side of lemon and herbs.

name: Tiramisu
description: Traditional Italian dessert made with coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

name: Grilled Chicken
description: Grilled chicken is a classic and healthy dish that highlights the natural flavor of the chicken. The chicken is marinated in a blend of olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, herbs (like rosemary or thyme), and spices to infuse it with a zesty, aromatic taste. It's then grilled to perfection, creating a crispy, slightly charred exterior while keeping the meat tender and juicy on the inside. Grilled chicken is often served with vegetables, salad, or rice, making it a versatile option for a nutritious meal.

name: Chicken Shawarma
description: Chicken Shawarma is a flavorful Middle Eastern dish made by marinating thin slices of chicken in a mixture of yogurt, garlic, lemon juice, and spices such as cumin, coriander, and paprika. The marinated chicken is then roasted on a vertical rotisserie until itâ€™s tender and juicy, often with a slight char on the edges. The chicken is shaved off and typically served in a pita or flatbread, accompanied by toppings like tahini, garlic sauce, pickles, tomatoes, and onions, creating a delicious wrap or sandwich with a burst of bold, savory flavors.

name: Grilled Beef
description: Grilled beef is a simple and delicious dish made by seasoning regular cuts of beef, like steaks or ribeye, with salt, pepper, and olive oil. The beef is then cooked on a grill or pan at high heat, creating a beautiful sear on the outside while keeping the inside tender and juicy. Depending on your preference, it can be grilled to rare, medium, or well-done. It's often served with sides like vegetables, rice, or potatoes, making it a versatile and filling option for a meal.
